snippet: In its first official statement on the near collision of Chinese and American warships, the ministry refrained from alleging any improper conduct by the American side.
abstract: In its first official statement on the near collision of Chinese and American warships, the ministry refrained from alleging any improper conduct by the American side.

headline.main: Chinese Defense Ministry Issues Statement Playing Down Near Collision at Sea

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
